data.name: 0000 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, Nagato, I haven't erased everything yet, but it still reverted to the original space.

data.name: 0001 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Okay, it's changing back. Does that mean it's settled?

data.name: 0002 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The opponent's main body escaped.

data.name: 0003 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: What a mess... If we had erased it just a bit sooner it might not have gotten away.

data.name: 0004 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: You are not to blame. Do not worry about it.

data.name: 0005 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: No, but, isn't this a bad thing?

data.name: 0006 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Next time I will not fail.

data.name: 0007 (389.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: At a glance, she's the same as ever. However, something feels different about her.

data.name: 0008 (389.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: Perhaps she's frustrated with this result.

data.name: 0010 (389.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Kyon!

data.name: 0011 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Asahina…

data.name: 0012 (389.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: Thank goodness you're safe!

data.name: 0013 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm glad to see you're okay.

data.name: 0014 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You seem to know what's going on here.

data.name: 0015 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Yes, that's correct.

data.name: 0016 (389.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The fact that everyone's here except Haruhi means that she must certainly be involved.

data.name: 0017 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Miss Asahina noticed that you had disappeared.

data.name: 0018 (389.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: He suddenly vanished before my eyes, so I was really frightened…

data.name: 0019 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Just what happened, exactly?

data.name: 0020 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: You completely lose me when you bring up "spaces" and "phases" and the like.

data.name: 0021 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: As you may be aware, it gives off a feeling similar to closed space…

data.name: 0022 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Closed space? The thing Haruhi generates when her pent-up stress overflows, like that?

data.name: 0023 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So, that Haruhi is the cause of this mess after all?

data.name: 0025 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The closed space originating from Haruhi Suzumiya is both similar and dissimilar.

data.name: 0026 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That is indeed the case. Now then, what would be a good way to explain this...?

data.name: 0027 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Please try to make your explanation as digestible as possible.

data.name: 0028 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: It split off from our current spatial reality, so it would be fitting to call it "abnormal space."

data.name: 0029 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: That is what's occurring right now.

data.name: 0030 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Furthermore, according to Miss Nagato, it seems to exist everywhere in this school.

data.name: 0031 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Huh…?

data.name: 0032 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: The space you wandered into was just about to reach a stabilized state.

data.name: 0033 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's unexpected... so then I was in a life or death situation?

data.name: 0034 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Regrettably, the crisis is still ongoing.

data.name: 0035 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Even at this very moment, more abnormal space is breaking out within the school.

data.name: 0036 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: When and where more such classrooms appear is no laughing matter I'm afraid.

data.name: 0037 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Ah… So that's what I was experiencing.

data.name: 0038 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Nagato, can't you do something about it with your abilities?

data.name: 0039 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Possibly. However it is not recommended.

data.name: 0040 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Why do you say that?

data.name: 0041 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Currently, the information couplings upholding the school space are losing stability.

data.name: 0042 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Forced erasure could potentially generate distortions in the surrounding space.

data.name: 0043 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: To put it simply--

data.name: 0044 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Abruptly damming the flow of a river could be disastrous to the surrounding environment.

data.name: 0045 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Wouldn't you agree?

data.name: 0046 (389.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: It's better to have it translated simply by Koizumi after all.

data.name: 0049 (389.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: But, what should we do then…

data.name: 0050 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: There sure doesn't seem to be an easy answer, so what would be our best bet?

data.name: 0052 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Identify the source and eliminate it.

data.name: 0053 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Then it will fade away naturally.

data.name: 0054 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: So you're saying we should do the same thing that we did in that last abnormal space?

data.name: 0055 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Correct.

data.name: 0057 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If that's the case we better act quickly as we don't have time to waste.

data.name: 0058 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: That's right. We should probably start now.

data.name: 0059 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: That is impossible.

data.name: 0060 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Hey, but isn't it a bad idea to leave them alone?

data.name: 0061 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: Pinpointing the data lifeform that appears to be generating abnormal space...

data.name: 0062 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: is difficult. It may be moving.

data.name: 0063 (389.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I suddenly dropped my shoulders in disappointment.

data.name: 0064 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: It will take a little more time to locate the precise position.

data.name: 0065 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: In that case, I'll leave it to Nagato.

data.name: 0066 (389.ja) NAGATO (長門)
data.value: I understand.

data.name: 0068 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In that case, there's only one thing we can do.

data.name: 0069 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: And what would that be?

data.name: 0070 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: We must somehow find a way to keep Miss Suzumiya away from the school.

data.name: 0071 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: This will make Miss Nagato's job easier, as well as help to prevent the worst case scenario.

data.name: 0072 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: The worst case scenario?

data.name: 0073 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If Miss Suzumiya witnesses this abnormal situation, something very serious may happen.

data.name: 0074 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: She'd probably be overjoyed.

data.name: 0075 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: I'm afraid that's not the point.

data.name: 0076 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: If Miss Suzumiya sees abnormal space, she will come to believe that it really exists.

data.name: 0077 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: A world where abnormal space exists everywhere could become normal.

data.name: 0078 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: In conclusion, something we'd call a global scale crisis.

data.name: 0079 (389.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I couldn't brush off what Koizumi said as a mere exaggeration.

data.name: 0080 (389.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: A world where glowing giants rampage freely-- A world where nobody else exists--

data.name: 0081 (389.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: I've seen all of that happen with my own eyes.

data.name: 0082 (389.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: The last thing I want is another confusing world like that getting mass produced.

data.name: 0084 (389.ja) MIKURU (みくる)
data.value: But Suzumiya, she's very enthusiastic about searching for unnatural phenomena.

data.name: 0085 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: There are several ways to keep Miss Suzumiya away from the school.

data.name: 0086 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: For example, arranging for something else that would interest her.

data.name: 0087 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Or otherwise, make her fundamentally lose interest in this unnatural phenomenon.

data.name: 0088 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: Lose interest……huh.

data.name: 0089 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: Either way, we are considerably lacking in information.

data.name: 0090 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: For now, it may be good to hear more of what the computer club members have to say.

data.name: 0091 (389.ja) MONOLOGUE (モノロ)
data.value: That's right……

data.name: 0092 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: I think we should split into two groups. One to distract Haruhi, and the other to gather info.

data.name: 0093 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: This is a troublesome matter isn't it?

data.name: 0094 (389.ja) KYON (キョン)
data.value: We'll also need an excuse for being short on members when we meet with Haruhi.

data.name: 0095 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: About that, it may be fine to honestly say we went back to interview the witnesses more.

data.name: 0096 (389.ja) KOIZUMI (古泉)
data.value: So then, how should we do this?

data.name: 0097 (389.ja) INFO (CHOICE)
data.value: About Haruhi
